title: Introduction to the Lotus Sutra
description: To many Buddhists, the Lotus Sutra is one of the most important, if not the most important, sutras in the Buddhist canon. To the beginning student of Buddhism, however, the Lotus Sutra often presents a difficult challenge. For this reason, the authors have developed "an introduction" to the Lotus Sutra, making it easy to understand this central scripture of Mahayana Buddhism.
author: Shinjo Suguro
